animeTitle: Dragon Ball Z Movie 08: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan (Dub)
otherNames: Dragon Ball Z Movie 08: Moetsukiro!! Nessen, Ressen, Chougekisen, Dragon Ball Z: The Burning Battles, DRAGON BALL Z 燃えつきろ!! 熱戦・烈戦・超激戦
synopsis: As Goku investigates the destruction of the Southern Galaxy, Vegeta is taken to be King of the New Planet Vegeta, and to destroy the Legendary Super Saiyan, Brolly.
